title: Microsoft Corp. stock underperforms Friday when compared to competitors
text:
Shares of Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       slid 0.71% to $406.22 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around grim trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.65% to 5,123.69 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.18% to 38,722.69. Microsoft Corp. closed $14.60 below its 52-week high ($420.82), which the company reached on February 9th. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Friday, as Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -1.06%
       rose 1.02% to $170.73, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.21%
       rose 0.78% to $136.29, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       rose 0.77% to $135.41. Trading volume (17.2 M) remained 5.5 million below its 50-day average volume of 22.7 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use.
